DP goes to Japan (online)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2000 Topics (Year Of The Phoenix): DP goes to Japan (online)
By Dark Phoenix on Tuesday, August 15, 2000 - 03:50 am:

Well, I always wondered what the Tecmo Japanese Website had for info. But alas, I couldn't read it! However, I did manage to find an online translator (crude but it did the job) and managed to pick out a few bits of info. Believe me this was NOT easy!

Betcha never saw this guy. Click here to see him. If you don't have the Japanese version, you never will, because he's tied to the pocketstation.

I actually found some info on the Dino Tail! Apparently having it in the inventory reduces the amount of Fatigue caused by battles and may even reduce the lifespan hits caused by them. I will look into this further later on.

The mystery deepens with the God's Slate. When I looked into their item list, it was in the selling items category, no mention was even made of the Pocketstation!

Apparently, Pure Gold is for more than just selling. It seems to reduce fatigue and stress on certain monsters. Again, I will look into this as well.

And as for the Taurus Horn, it raises the chances the possibility of getting a Centaur and improves the combined monster's nature. (If Nate is correct it may apply to more than just Centuars...)

It was rough going but I didn't leave empty handed. Sayonnara!

By Dark Phoenix on Tuesday, August 15, 2000 - 03:06 pm:

Here's the URL of the online Dictionary I used. It's not much but it'll give you a bare minimum to go by. **Make sure your browser supports Japanese Text first!**
